findings.title: Magnolia minting attack vector
findings.description: Approved token contract can be used for minting Magnolia tokens if compromised or misused by its owner, potentially leading to devaluation of Magnolia tokens.

findings.title: Funds locked in the contract due to rounding
findings.description: It's possible that the contract will accumulate irretrievable token balances due to division rounding present at various places.
